{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$4.2M in 2021-2022** on contracts with MEGA TECH.

Across 287 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 6 have at least one amendment (2%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 19% and the average number of amendments was 1.17. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$75.7K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.13 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$61.1K. The longest contract was 1.13 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
